This is another note for "Out Hero"

The imperials aren't coming.  Instead, they are moving to fence in the ridge.  They are already camped out down below, and a team of several guards, attack dogs and one mage is approaching the top of the ridge from the northeast.  The mage is clearly high level - an attack is clearly not viable.  Attempting to attack will result in the player being captured, interrogated, and shipped off a siege fodder on the front lines.The mage arrived at the small outpost 10 miles up the road within hours of the player's encounter on the ridge.  He ordered all soldiers at the post to accompany him to the ridge, leaving the post abandoned.  If the player stays to observe, she will see the mage sweep the ridge with fireballs, the magical equivalent of an artillery strike.
The player can continue up to the abandoned post, where she will find supplies, documents and a small copper sphere.

The Wizard Marshall's name is Margrave Olaf Callister.  The sphere is a penny rider (slang). Penny rider references riders who carry messages between noble estates for a "penny" (small wages).  The riders provided a very fast method of delivering information or light goods in the absence of magic.
